'''''"Rosebud..."''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series III]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to break a [[Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage|Cryo Cicin Mage]]'s shield.

==Trivia==
* The name of an achievement is a reference to the 1941 movie {{w|Citizen Kane}}. The movie begins with the titular character Charles Foster Kane holding a snow globe and cryptically saying "Rosebud" before dying.
